articles.author: ANI
articles.title: RBI announces digital payments intelligence platform to check online frauds - Hindustan Times
articles.description: This platform, leveraging advanced technologies, aims to mitigate payment fraud risks and enhance the safety of digital transactions.
articles.content: In a bid to bolster the safety and security of digital payments and enhance regulatory frameworks, the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) unveiled a series of proposals aimed at fostering innovation, inclus… [+6034 chars]

articles.title: Buy-the-dip didn't work for mutual fund investors on election result day due to 'tech glitch' - The Economic Times
articles.description: Mutual fund investors faced disappointment as a technical glitch led to delayed NAV allotment amid a stock market crash. Many investors demanded compensation for losses incurred due to the glitch.
articles.content: Mutual fund investors, who were looking to buy the dip as the stock market crashed on Tuesday amid election results, were disappointed as a "technical glitch" delayed execution and they were allotted… [+2985 chars]
